org.knime.core.util.crypto

Class Encrypter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.util.crypto.Encrypter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEncrypter

    public final class Encrypter
extends Object
implements IEncrypter
    Simple class to en-/decrypt strings with a fixed key.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Encrypter(String key)
      Creates a new encrypter using the given key for en- and decryption.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String decrypt(String data)
      Decrypts strings.
      String encrypt(String data)
      Encrypts strings and returns a Base64 string.
      String encrypt(String data, int salt)
      Encrypts strings and returns a Base64 string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Encrypter

        public Encrypter(String key)
          throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                 NoSuchPaddingException,
                 InvalidKeySpecException
        Creates a new encrypter using the given key for en- and decryption.
        Parameters:
        key - the secret key. Ideally it should have at least 128bits or 16 characters
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - is for some strange reason the AES cipher implementation cannot be found
        InvalidKeySpecException - if the public key contained in the license is invalid
        NoSuchPaddingException - if the padding algorithm is unknown

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public String encrypt(String data)
               throws BadPaddingException,
                      IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      InvalidKeyException,
                      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Encrypts strings and returns a Base64 string. If the input string is null, the output will be null, too. The implementation will add a random salt so that different encryptions of the same data result in different result.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface IEncrypter
        Parameters:
        data - as string
        Returns:
        the encrypted data or null
        Throws:
        BadPaddingException - BadPaddingException
        IllegalBlockSizeException - IllegalBlockSizeException
        InvalidKeyException - InvalidKeyException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - InvalidAlgorithmParameterException

      • encrypt

        public String encrypt(String data,
                      int salt)
               throws BadPaddingException,
                      IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      InvalidKeyException,
                      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Encrypts strings and returns a Base64 string. If the input string is null, the output will be null, too. This implementation uses the argument salt (some random number) - the same method arguments will return the same encrypted data.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface IEncrypter
        Parameters:
        data - as string
        salt - The (random or fixed) salt.
        Returns:
        the encrypted data or null
        Throws:
        BadPaddingException - BadPaddingException
        IllegalBlockSizeException - IllegalBlockSizeException
        InvalidKeyException - InvalidKeyException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - InvalidAlgorithmParameterException

      • decrypt

        public String decrypt(String data)
               throws BadPaddingException,
                      IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      InvalidKeyException,
                      IOException,
                      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Decrypts strings. If the input string is null, the output will be null, too.
        Specified by:
        decrypt in interface IEncrypter
        Parameters:
        data - the data to decrypt, encoded with Base64
        Returns:
        the decrypted data or null
        Throws:
        BadPaddingException - BadPaddingException
        IllegalBlockSizeException - IllegalBlockSizeException
        InvalidKeyException - InvalidKeyException
        IOException - IOException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
